name: Shepherd Saga
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 38 Jam. It is my first game.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$17502

You are a shepherd, who travels the land with his sheep, avoiding predators, towards a mysterious goal. Protect your sheep, lure predators into traps. Your loyal dog will attack predators on sight, but he is not fit for battles, so...

Use Arrows to move

Use Space to shout (it scares the sheep and predators away for a bit)

Use R to run

Use S to light up your staff (does nothing)
